title: How to unsubscribe from HelloFresh (US)
description: This guide provides instructions on how to cancel your HelloFresh US subscription. Please note that cancellation deadlines apply, and refunds are typically not offered for processed orders.

web.title: Cancel HelloFresh Subscription via Website
web.description:
Here's how to cancel your HelloFresh subscription through their website:

*   Go to the HelloFresh US website.
*   Log in to your account.
*   Click on your name in the upper right-hand corner and go to 'Account Settings'.
*   Look for the 'Cancel Plan' option in the 'Plan settings' or 'Status' section.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the cancellation process.
*   Ensure you receive a confirmation message to verify your cancellation.
*   Cancel by 11:59 PM PST 5 days before your next scheduled delivery to avoid being charged.

seo_text: Cancel HelloFresh US subscription. Step-by-step guide to unsubscribe from HelloFresh. Avoid HelloFresh charges by canceling before the deadline. Pause HelloFresh subscription instead of canceling. Manage HelloFresh account settings.
